topRecommendations.title: Software Engineering & Computer Science
topRecommendations.description: Suitable for those who love technology, problem-solving, and building complex systems

topRecommendations.title: Interdisciplinary IT & Emerging Technologies
topRecommendations.description: Suitable for those who thrive at the intersection of technology and other fields

topRecommendations.title: Digital Design & Media Technology
topRecommendations.description: Suitable for those with creativity and aesthetic sense in digital media

topRecommendations.title: Business Information Systems & IT Management
topRecommendations.description: Suitable for those with management skills and business understanding combined with technology

questions.partObjective: To assess students' voluntary interests, as they are strong indicators of intrinsic motivation and natural curiosity.
questions.question: Participating in a programming competition (hackathon) or solving coding puzzles (e.g., LeetCode).

questions.partObjective: To assess students' voluntary interests, as they are strong indicators of intrinsic motivation and natural curiosity.
questions.question: Tinkering with computer hardware, assembling a PC, or building simple electronic circuits (e.g., with Arduino, Raspberry Pi).

questions.question: Spending hours optimizing a piece of code or a process to make it run faster or consume less memory.

questions.partObjective: To assess students' voluntary interests, as they are strong indicators of intrinsic motivation and natural curiosity.
questions.question: Self-learning a new programming language or complex technology (e.g., AI, blockchain) simply out of curiosity.

questions.question: Analyzing real-world data (e.g., tracking personal spending via spreadsheets, analyzing sports statistics, tracking investment performance).

questions.partObjective: To assess students' voluntary interests, as they are strong indicators of intrinsic motivation and natural curiosity.

questions.partObjective: To assess students' voluntary interests, as they are strong indicators of intrinsic motivation and natural curiosity.

questions.partObjective: To assess students' voluntary interests, as they are strong indicators of intrinsic motivation and natural curiosity.

questions.partObjective: To assess students' voluntary interests, as they are strong indicators of intrinsic motivation and natural curiosity.
questions.question: Learning a new foreign language or joining international cultural exchange clubs.

questions.partObjective: To assess students' voluntary interests, as they are strong indicators of intrinsic motivation and natural curiosity.

questions.partObjective: To assess personality traits and preferred work styles, which predict fit with the culture and job requirements of each field.
questions.question: When facing a complex problem, I prefer to research deeply and find the optimal solution on my own, rather than immediately asking others for the solution.

questions.partObjective: To assess personality traits and preferred work styles, which predict fit with the culture and job requirements of each field.
questions.question: I pay close attention to small details. I feel uncomfortable when things are inaccurate, illogical, or lack clear order.

questions.partObjective: To assess personality traits and preferred work styles, which predict fit with the culture and job requirements of each field.
questions.question: I can patiently work on a logical or complex technical problem (like debugging) for hours without getting discouraged.

questions.partObjective: To assess personality traits and preferred work styles, which predict fit with the culture and job requirements of each field.
questions.question: I find theoretical and abstract concepts (e.g., mathematical theorems, theoretical models) interesting.

questions.partObjective: To assess personality traits and preferred work styles, which predict fit with the culture and job requirements of each field.
questions.question: I tend to look at the "big picture" and the end goal, rather than getting bogged down in minute technical details.

questions.partObjective: To assess personality traits and preferred work styles, which predict fit with the culture and job requirements of each field.
questions.question: I feel comfortable and confident leading a team, assigning tasks, and motivating others to achieve a common goal.

questions.partObjective: To assess personality traits and preferred work styles, which predict fit with the culture and job requirements of each field.
questions.question: I am interested in how technology can help an organization generate revenue, save costs, or gain a competitive advantage.

questions.partObjective: To assess personality traits and preferred work styles, which predict fit with the culture and job requirements of each field.
questions.question: I believe I have strong negotiation and persuasion skills to get everyone to agree on a plan.

questions.partObjective: To assess personality traits and preferred work styles, which predict fit with the culture and job requirements of each field.
questions.question: I often think about how to present information (even technical info) in the simplest, easiest to understand, and most engaging way for others.

questions.partObjective: To assess personality traits and preferred work styles, which predict fit with the culture and job requirements of each field.
questions.question: I can easily put myself in the end-user's or audience's shoes to understand their needs, emotions, and difficulties.

questions.partObjective: To assess personality traits and preferred work styles, which predict fit with the culture and job requirements of each field.
questions.question: Self-expression (through writing, speaking, or designing) is a crucial part of who I am.

questions.partObjective: To assess personality traits and preferred work styles, which predict fit with the culture and job requirements of each field.
questions.question: I enjoy working at the intersection of different fields (e.g., combining technology with medicine, or technology with art).

questions.partObjective: To assess personality traits and preferred work styles, which predict fit with the culture and job requirements of each field.
questions.question: I easily adapt to new environments, tools, or work teams. I view change as a learning opportunity.

questions.partObjective: To assess personality traits and preferred work styles, which predict fit with the culture and job requirements of each field.
questions.question: I am excited about working in an international or multicultural environment.
